name: Introduction to Performance Art
description: An introduction to the history and theory of performance art, as well as fundamentals of production and performance.

name: Acting for Performance Art
description: Exploring the role of the actor/performer in performance art, with an emphasis on improvisation and physicality.

name: Directing and Producing Performance Art
description: Exploring the role of the director/producer in performance art, with an emphasis on collaboration and problem-solving.

name: Advanced Performance Art
description: Exploring the artistic and political potential of performance art, with an emphasis on creating original works.
